text: Channel Management: Added the ability to assign Managers as proxies to add/remove Members and manage Channel descriptions.
External Link: Sender can now set files sharing as ‘View-only’ for Images, Videos & PDF, preventing file downloads.
External Link: Receiver without a Sharekey account can now upload & download large folders remotely.
Company Tab: Included company logo and employee count information (Desktop app).
Image Viewer: Introduced zoom in/out functionality for viewing images.
General Updates: Bug fixes and performance improvements.
